DataElement.preferredName: Biological Entity Part Anatomic Site Laterality Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) where the anatomic site is in a biologic entity part. EXAMPLE(S): left, right, both

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biological Entity Part Anatomic Site Laterality Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.:An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).:One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole._Named locations of or within the body.:Dominant use or manifestations of one side of the body versus the other; referring to a side of the body or of a structure.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.
